text: The King's Case Note is a 2017 South Korean comedy film directed by Moon Hyun- sung, starring Lee Sun-kyun and Ahn Jae-hong. ==Plot== A king and his archivist search for the truth behind a crime that threatens the stability of the kingdom. ==Cast== *Lee Sun-kyun as King Yejong **Kang Chan-hee as young King Yejong *Ahn Jae-hong as Yoon Yi-seo *Kim Hee-won as Nam Gun-hee *Kyung Soo-jin as Sun-hwa *Jung Hae-in as Heuk-woon *Joo Jin-mo as Jik Je-hak *Jang Young-nam as Soo-bin *Shim Wan-joon as Fisherman *Kim Eung-soo as First vice- premier *Park Jung-min as Crown Prince Ui-kyung (special appearance) ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2017 films Category:2010s adventure comedy films Category:South Korean films Category:South Korean adventure comedy films Category:South Korean historical comedy films Category:CJ Entertainment films Category:Films based on manhwa Category:2017 comedy films
title: The King's Case Note
